flounder.physics

Class Sphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.physics.Sphere
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBounding<Sphere>

    public class Sphere
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBounding<Sphere>
    Represents a sphere in a 3d space.

      • recalculate

        public static Sphere recalculate(Sphere source,
                                 Vector3f position,
                                 float scale,
                                 Sphere destination)
        Creates an Sphere equivalent to this, but in a new position and scale.
        Parameters:
        source - The source Sphere.
        position - The amount to move.
        scale - The amount to scale the object.
        destination - The destination Sphere or null if a new Sphere is to be created.
        Returns:
        An Sphere equivalent to this, but in a new position.
